data.Name: dark_teleport_chance
data.Description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in darkness

data.Name: light_teleport_chance
data.Description: Modifies the chance that the entity will teleport if the entity is in daylight

data.Name: max_random_teleport_time
data.Description: Maximum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

data.Name: min_random_teleport_time
data.Description: Minimum amount of time in seconds between random teleports

data.Name: random_teleport_cube
data.Description: Entity will teleport to a random position within the area defined by this cube

data.Name: random_teleports
data.Description: If true, the entity will teleport randomly

data.Name: target_distance
data.Description: Maximum distance the entity will teleport when chasing a target

data.Name: target_teleport_chance
data.Description: The chance that the entity will teleport between 0.0 and 1.0. 1.0 means 100%
